org.openntf.formula

Class FormulaContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openntf.formula.FormulaContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormulaContextNotes

    public class FormulaContext
extends Object
    This is the FormulaContext that is used for evaluation
    Author:
    Roland Praml, Foconis AG

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(Map<String,Object> dataMap,
                 Formatter formatter,
                 FormulaParser parser)
        Parameters:
        dataMap - the context document
        formatter - the formatter to format date/times
        parser - the parser

      • useBooleans

        public void useBooleans(boolean useit)
        the formula engine uses real booleans instead of 1 and 0. This is not 100% compatible to lotus, but it is more typesafe for misspellings. If you do not want this, you can disable booleans here
        Parameters:
        useit - Use booleans:
        TRUE if you want to use booleans (default)
        FALSE if you want to use 1 and 0 for boolean operatiosn.

      • getVarLC

        public ValueHolder getVarLC(String keyLowercase,
                            String key)
        Reading a value looks first in the internal vars and then in the document. Every value read from document is cached INTERNALLY. So pay attention if you program functions that modify the document otherwise!
        Parameters:
        keyLowercase - the key in lowercase. This is done for performance reasons
        key - the key in propercase
        Returns:
        ValueHolder

      • isAvailableVarLC

        public boolean isAvailableVarLC(String keyLowercase,
                                String key)
        Checks if a variable or a doc field is available
        Parameters:
        keyLowercase -
        key -
        Returns:

      • setVarLC

        public ValueHolder setVarLC(String keyLowercase,
                            ValueHolder elem)
        Set a value in the internal var cache. Nothing is written to a Document
        Parameters:
        keyLowercase - the key. Must be lowercase
        elem - the ValueHolder to set
        Returns:
        the OLD value
